subject: R Line - Weekend Planned Service Changes
message: Dec 2 - 5 Fri to Sun, 11:45 PM to 6 AM Sun 11:45 PM to Mon 5 AM No overnight R trains between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Whitehall St because of signal improvements. Take the 4 or N instead. R trains will run between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Bay Ridge-95 St. Trains will skip Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av, and 25 St in both directions. Transfer between trains at 36 St N/R or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr 4/N/R. Note: N trains will skip Jay St-MetroTech, Court St, Whitehall St, Rector St, Cortlandt St, and City Hall in both directions. Dec 2 - 5 Fri to Sun, 11:45 PM to 6 AM Sun 11:45 PM to Mon 5 AM R trains will skip Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av, 25 St in both directions because of signal improvements. Dec 3 - 4, Sat and Sun, 5:45 AM to 11:45 PM R trains will run via the Q in both directions between Canal St and DeKalb Av because of signal improvements.  Use the 1/2/3/4/5 at nearby stops. For Jay St-MetroTech and Court St, use nearby Borough Hall 2/3/4 station. For Whitehall St, Rector St, Cortlandt St, and City Hall, use nearby 1 or 4/5 stations. Transfer at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr 2/3/4, 14 St-Union Sq 4/5, or Times Sq-42 St 1/2/3/R. Note: At Canal St, R trains will stop at the Q platform. These service changes affect one or more ADA accessible stations. These travel alternatives may not be fully accessible. Please contact 511 to plan your trip. For more information, click on the mta.info link in this email and read station signs.

subject: Q Line - Weekend Planned Service Change

subject: D Line - Weekday, Weeknight, and Ongoing Planned Service Changes

Transfer at Queensboro Plaza 7/N/shuttle bus, 74 St-Roosevelt Av 7/E/F, 59 St/Lexington Av 4/6/N, Lexington Av/53 St 6/E, or Times Sq-42 St N/S/shuttle bus. subject: S (42 St) Line - Weekend Planned Service Change

subject: Q Line - Weekend Planned Service Change
message: Nov 18 - 21, Fri 9:45 PM to Mon 5 AM No Q trains between 57 St/7 Av and Lexington Av/63 St because of track replacement. Q trains will run in two sections: Between Stillwell Av and 57 St/7 Av, and via the N to/from Ditmars Blvd (every 12 minutes, days/evenings). Between 96 St and Lexington Av/63 St (every 15 minutes, days/evenings). To continue your trip, transfer between trains at 34 St-Herald Sq F/Q and/or Lexington Av/59 St N/R stations. Out-of-system transfers are also available between Lexington Av/63 St F/Q and Lexington Av/59 St N/Q/R. This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations and travel alternatives may not be fully accessible. Please contact 511 to plan your trip. For more information, click on the mta.info link in this email and read station signs.

subject: N Line - Weekend Planned Service Change
message: Nov 19 - 20, Sat 3:45 AM to Sun 6 PM N trains will run local in both directions between DeKalb Av and 59 St because of signal modernization.

subject: L Line - Weekend Planned Service Change
message: Nov 18 - 21, Fri 11:45 PM to Mon 5 AM No L trains between Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs and Lorimer St because of station improvements. Take free shuttle buses. L trains will run in two sections: 1. Between Rockaway Pkwy and Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs (every 12 minutes, days/evenings). 2. Between Lorimer St and 8 Av (every 12 minutes, days/evenings). Free shuttle buses will stop at Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs, DeKalb Av, Jefferson St, Morgan Av, Montrose Av, Grand St, Graham Av, and Lorimer St. Transfer between trains and buses at Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs and/or Lorimer St. For direct service to/from Manhattan, consider the A, C, or J at Broadway Junction. This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. These travel alternatives may not be fully accessible. Please contact 511 to plan your trip. For more information, click on the mta.info link in this email and read station signs.

subject: F Line - Weekend Planned Service Changes
message: Nov 19 - 20, Sat 3:45 AM to Sun 6 PM F trains will not run between Church Av and Stillwell Av because of signal modernization. F trains will run between 179 St and Church Av. Local buses will connect affected stations to the D, N, or Q. For direct service between Stillwell Av and Manhattan, take the D, N, or Q. This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. These travel alternatives may not be fully accessible. Please contact 511 to plan your trip. For more information, click on the mta.info link in this email and read station signs. Nov 18 - 21, Fri 11:45 PM to Mon 5 AM Jamaica-bound F trains will skip Briarwood and Sutphin Blvd because of communications improvements.

subject: E Line - Weekend and Ongoing Planned Service Changes
message: Nov 18 - 21, Fri 11:45 PM to Mon 5 AM No E trains between Union Turnpike and Jamaica Center because of communications improvements. Take free shuttle buses. E trains will run between World Trade Center and Union Turnpike, and via the F to/from Jamaica-179 St (Jamaica-bound trains will skip Briarwood and Sutphin Blvd F stations). Free shuttle buses will run between Union Turnpike and Jamaica Center. Transfer between trains and buses at Union Turnpike. For service between Manhattan and JFK Airport, take the A train to/from Howard Beach-JFK Airport. Nov 18 - 21, Fri 9:45 PM to Mon 5 AM Uptown E trains will skip Spring St and 23 St because of structural maintenance. Ongoing through Jun 2023 There will be limited access to/from the 3 Av entrance/exit in the Lexington Av/53 St station because we are replacing 25-year-old escalators. Enter/exit the station at Lexington Av instead. To avoid overcrowding situations, consider using the nearby 5 Av/53 St E/M or Lexington Av/59 St N/R/W stations instead.

subject: D Line - Weekend Planned Service Changes
message: Nov 18 - 21, Fri 11:30 PM to Mon 5 AM No D trains between 161 St-Yankee Stadium and 205 St because of structural maintenance. Take the 4 and/or free shuttle buses. D service will run between Stillwell Av and 161 St-Yankee Stadium, the last stop. For service between 161 St and Bedford Pk Blvd, take the 4 to/from nearby stations via transfer at 161 St. Free shuttle buses will run between Mosholu Pkwy 4 and 205 St. Transfer between the 4 and shuttle buses at Mosholu Pkwy. Note: This service change is expected to recur every weekend until December 19. This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. These travel alternatives may not be fully accessible. Please contact 511 to plan your trip. For more information, click on the mta.info link in this email and read station signs. Nov 18 - 20, Fri 11:45 PM to Sun 8 PM Coney Island-bound D trains will run via the N from 36 St to Stillwell Av because of signal improvements. Use a Manhattan-bound D to complete your trip. Transfer at Stillwell Av, 62 St-New Utrecht Av, or 36 St.

subject: C Line - Weekend Planned Service Change
message: Nov 18 - 20 Friday 9:45 PM to 11:45 PM Saturday, 6:15 AM to 11:15 PM Sunday, 7:30 AM to 11:15 PM 168 St-bound C trains will run via the F from Jay St-MetroTech to 34 St-Herald Sq and via the D to 59 St-Columbus Circle because of structural maintenance. For High St, Fulton St, Chambers St, Canal St, 14 St, 34 St, and 42 St-Port Authority Bus Terminal, take the A via transfer at Jay St-MetroTech, W 4 St, or 59 St-Columbus Circle. To Spring St, transfer to a downtown C/E at W 4 St. From Spring St, take a downtown C/E to Canal St for an uptown A to 59 St-Columbus Circle for the C. To 23 St and 50 St, transfer to a downtown C at 59 St-Columbus Circle, or use nearby stations on 6 Av. From 23 St, take a downtown C/E to W 4 St for the uptown C. From 50 St, take the E to 7 Av for the C.

N service will run in two sections: 1. Between Stillwell Av and Times Sq-42 St. 2. N trains will run between Ditmars Blvd and 86 St. Free shuttle buses will run between 86 St and Stillwell Av.
